name: TheEclipse:Rebalance
description:
THE ECLIPSE:REBALANCE

It all started with the solar eclipse and now it takes a balance to fix it. Are you ready to achieve that balance?

all objects are made by our team

  this game is designed for Global Game Jam  and over a 48 hour period

our team: Sudenas Türkmen, Kerem Şimşek, Enes Yoraz, Yavuz Selim Dönmez, Hamza Özkeçeci
